GULF INSPECTION INTERNATIONAL
FIELD PERMEABILITY TEST(ASTM D6391)


BOREHOLE NO.:{{doc.borehole_no or ""}}
DEPTH OF TEST IN BH (m): {{doc.depth_of_test or ""}}
TYPE OF SOIL: {{doc.type_of_soil or ""}}
DEPTH OF WATER TABLE (Cm): {{doc.depth_of_water or ""}}
SCREEN LENGTH (Cm) : {{doc.screen_length or ""}}
DEPTH ( m ): {{doc.depthm or ""}}
DEPTH OF CASING (m):{{doc.depth_of_casing or ""}}
DATE OF TEST:{{frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.date_of_test) or ""}}
LENGTH / RADIUS FOR SCREEN: {{doc.length_radius or ""}}
HIGHT OF CASING ABOVE G.L (Cm):{{doc.hight_of_casing or ""}}
INTERNAL DIAMETER OF CASING (Cm):{{doc.internal_diameter or ""}}
CROSS SECTION OF CASING (Cm2) : {{doc.cross_section or ""}}
{%- for row in doc.fp_test -%} {%- endfor -%}
Test No. t ft DY(Cm) Dh(Cm) Time(sec.) K(Cm/sec )
{{loop.index}} {{row.t or ""}} {{row.ft or ""}} {{row.dy_cm or ""}} {{row.dh_cm or ""}} {{row.time_sec or ""}} {{row.k_cmsec or ""}}

Remarks

{{doc.remarks or ""}}

K = A / FT

Where

K = Coffeicent of permeability

F = 2 P L / ln (L/R) ( L = Length of screen , R = Radius of casing )

T = ( t2 - t1 ) / ln (H1 / H2) ( t1, t2 = Time in second , H1, H2 = Water level during test)


DY = Distance from top of casing to water level inside casing

Dh = Height of water above water table




Project:{{doc.project or ""}}
Client:{{doc.customer or ""}}
name: Field Permeability Test
